ModMetaData.name: RJW Sexperience

ModMetaData.description:
This is a submod for RJW that adds: - Sex skill - Lust stat - Cum as collectable resource, cum buckets and cum addiction - More sex records - Partner sex history, sex type statistics and UI to display these - Virgin trait - Bastard relation
